title: Perform Disaster Recovery Test
description: As part of a planned drill, the SRE team needs to test the disaster recovery plan by failing over to a secondary data center.

tasks.description: Announce the planned disaster recovery test to all internal stakeholders.
tasks.expected_outcome: All teams are aware of the upcoming DR test.

tasks.description: Execute the script to fail over production traffic and services to the secondary data center.
Run a series of health checks to verify that the application is fully functional in the secondary data center.
tasks.expected_outcome: All health checks pass, confirming the DR site is operational.

tasks.description: After the test, fail back to the primary data center.
